item.title: Adamas One Corp 10-K
item.description: Adamas One Corp, which is in the Jewelry, Silverware & Plated Ware [3910] industry, SEC 10-K filing on January 13, 2023 had 28256 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: diamond - 306 instances financial - 243 instances may - 243 instances stock - 234 instances 2022 - 219 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
